Translations.Text: king said Bring him mna. When posol pojdem him he said Ist tvoj lord ziadat him investigate zensky rez ich hands Moj Lord bol fully aware z ich kut plany

(king) said (do zensky) Co robit ona zauzlit incident when ona tried zvadzat Joseph? They said GOD zakazat; my nie zauzlit z anything zly committed by him. manzelka governor said Teraz truth prevailed Ja je jeden tried zvadzat him he bol truthful
Ja hope he realize ze ja never zradit him jeho absence GOD nie zehnat kut plany betrayers
Ja nie reklamacia innocence myself. self bol zastanca z zverak except for those attained zlutovanie moj Lord Moj Lord bol Forgiver Merciful
king said Bring him mna ja hire him zavodny mna. When he talked s him he said Dnes ona have prominent position us
He said Robit mna treasurer ja zazitok v this area a knowledgeable
My thus zriadit Joseph zem ruling mat rad he zelat. My lejak our zlutovanie whomever my will my never zlyhat recompense the righteous
Additionally reward Hereafter je vecer dobre those verit lead righteous zivot
